content: 1HoDLCLUB Litecoin CasinoWelcome everyone to the Official 1HoDLCLUB Fine Silver 999.9 Litecoin poker Chips Sale!First I would like to thank all the people who participated in the previous sale! thank you for your enormous trust and support! it is really much appreciated!This is the last sale of solo chips from the 1HoDLCLUB Litecoin casino collection! Many thanks to everyone for your support!this is the official sale of 1HoDLCLUB Fine Silver 999.9 Litecoin poker chips, this sale is dedicated to solo chips, serial 1 to 84.Each chips serial is laser graved in the front of the chips "1, 2, 3", this version has various parts plated in Gold and does not have a hologram on the front but a design!Solo chips means that there are no rolls, whether you take 10 or 21 chips you will have 10 or 21 solo chips in air tites.All the chips have the denomination 1 LTC and are sold loaded [Of course they will be loaded once they reach the hands of their new owners and loading gonna be made by batch]Since this is the official sale, there is no limit on the purchase of chips per member. Serial Numbers cannot be choose, first arrived, first served. The sale started on the 1hodlclub.store website yesterday at 9pm UTC, that's why there are already sales!1HoDLCLUB Fine Silver 999.9 Litecoin Poker chipsMintage : 84 [50 on sale] -  40 SOLD / 10 AVAILABLEOnly 50 avaialbe for sale on the 84 limited edition, i receive the last 34 next week!Material : Fine Silver 999.9Size : 39mmThickness : 2.67mmWeight : 1ozDenomination : 1 LTCSerial : 1 to 81The price is [200$]  per chip + 1 LTC loading per chip + shipping costThe first orders will be sent on Thursday, January 19, 2022!Shipping cost [Express + Tracking] :Worldwide:1 - 5 chips : 18$6 - 15 chips : 23$16 - 25 chips : 33$Europe:1-5 coins - 15$6 - 15 chips : 20$16 - 25 chips : 26$Payment Adress : You can pay the chips in BTC and the loading separately, or all in LTC!BTC : bc1qfccwapegpcz2n3aehaaks7vhk8yvzpr504aky7LTC : ltc1quaans9kp3gjqdj0ry4jda6n7lywxdhvcpqqyyeAfter payment please send me the following information :TxID :Amount of BTC : Chips / ShippingAmount of LTC : LoadingShipping details : use privnote if possible[If you can include email to details it's better for customs.]Reference list : Public addresses will be added tomorrow evening!Code:LTC  : https://twitter.com/MrCryptHODL1HoDLCLUB Store : https://1hodlclub.store [NEW]

Hi again my friend !that's weird, i just resend the message to you !Yes make more sense¬† Thanks, got your message now.The reason why this can happen: You click send, but the message is not sent IF the message-window was left open for too long. It is a kind of session time-out.
